k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:  # if the length of the string is less than or equal to k
    print(s)
else:  # if the length of the string is greater than k
    print(s[:k] + "...")

# coding: utf-8

K = int(input())
S = input()

if len(S) > K:
    print(S[:K] + '...')
else:
    print(S)

K = int(input())
S = input()

if len(S) > K:
    print(S[:K] + '...')
else:
    print(S)

k = int(input())
s = input()

if len(s) <= k:
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + "...")


N, K = map(int, input().split())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

dp = [float('inf')] * N
dp[0] = 0

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(1, K+1):
        if i + j < N:
            dp[i+j] = min(dp[i+j], dp[i] + abs(h[i] - h[i+j]))

print(dp[-1])
